t: The New Amazon Account Health Reality

t: Learn the Ins and Outs of Amazon Account Health Rating
s: The Amazon Account Health Rating (AHR) is a metric used to monitor your Amazon account health in Amazon Seller Central. Sellers can use this metric to see an overview of their account performance and monitor it over time.
